content.rendered:
The Kubo tub chair is a modern approach on our Club Tub Chair. Opting for straight lines and avoiding curves, the Kubo makes a bold statement that different can be beautiful. 

Fully upholstered in a soft black leather from stock.

Available in 10 working days.

This item carries a 3 year guarantee
